about_the_game:
Re-live the mysterious experience of "The Walsingham Files: Chapter Two" by purchasing the "The Walsingham Files: Chapter Two " Detective's DLC Brief.

Track List

01 - Director's Commentary
02 - The Safehouse
03 - Calatrava's Theme
04 - The Kidnapping
05 - The Cultist's Shrine
